metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45931 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: HarfBuzz 2.9.0 has an out-of-bounds write in hb_bit_set_invertible_t::set (called from hb_sparseset_t<hb_bit_set_invertible_t>::set and hb_set_copy).

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per the oss-fuzz bug, this issue was introduced somewhere between 2021-08-15 and 2021-08-20, which is in 2.9.0 or 2.9.1.

criterions.comment: harfbuzz: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
